title: Birth
description: Nicolas Sarkozy is born in Paris, France.

title: Becomes Mayor of Neuilly-sur-Seine
description: At the age of 28, Sarkozy becomes the youngest mayor of a town with more than 50,000 inhabitants in France.

title: Becomes Budget Minister
description: Sarkozy becomes Budget Minister and spokesman for the executive in the government of Prime Minister Édouard Balladur.

title: Becomes Interior Minister
description: Sarkozy is named Minister of the Interior and Internal Security in the government of Prime Minister Jean-Pierre Raffarin.

title: Becomes Finance Minister
description: Sarkozy becomes Minister of State, Minister of Economy, Finance, and Industry.

title: Elected President of France
description: Sarkozy is elected President of France, defeating the Socialist Party's candidate Ségolène Royal.

title: Inauguration as President
description: Sarkozy is inaugurated as President of France.

title: Start of Military Intervention in Libya
description: Under Sarkozy's presidency, France takes a leading role in the NATO-led military intervention in Libya.

title: Defeat in Presidential Election
description: Sarkozy is defeated by François Hollande in the presidential election, becoming the first one-term president since Valéry Giscard d'Estaing.

title: Defeat in Republican Primary
description: Sarkozy comes in third in the primary for the Republican party's candidate for the 2017 presidential election, ending his political career.
